Test Name: Vancomycin-Resistant Enterococcus (VRE) Molecular Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Rectal swab, stool, or clinical isolate (e.g., wound or urine)
Purpose: To detect vanA/vanB genes of Vancomycin-Resistant Enterococcus using PCR for accurate identification of VRE.
Container: Appropriate specimen transport medium with sterile swab or container suitable for stool/clinical isolate
Equipment: PCR thermocycler, centrifuge, pipettes with tips, biological safety cabinet, vortex mixer
